description: Measure the SMC Gaia Synthetic I-band (i_jkc_mag) TRGB magnitude for the All Stars sample using provided data and paper methodology.
instructions: Load Gaia data from the provided file.
De-extinct the Gaia Synthetic I-band magnitude (`i_jkc_mag`) using the reddening map and the extinction correction from the paper.
Apply Gaia quality and astrometric cuts as in the paper, including RUWE.
Use the following values for photometric quality cuts: C* < 1sigma, beta < 0.99, ipd_frac_multi_peak < 7, ipd_frac_odd_win < 7
Select Red Giant Branch stars based on color-magnitude diagram position.
Measure the TRGB using a smoothing width of 0.10 mag.
Report this TRGB magnitude value as a single float. Do not perform bootstrapping or calculate uncertainty.
